title: TRUST is a beautiful sacrifice of praise in the eyes of God and it is how we can put the sacrifice in...

attachments.displayName:
TRUST is a beautiful sacrifice of praise in the eyes of God and it is how we can put the sacrifice in our salvation.  We must live a life of Praise-Faith, where we surrender what is seen in our circumstantial  understanding to what we KNOW, that God IS working in the unseen for our good and we Praise Him for WHO He is and how incredibly He takes care of the spirit, heart, soul, mind, body and will of those who are HIS. A sacrifice of praise is belief in God that we activate as a response of TRUST to a sudden, seemingly unfavorable life change.
PRAISE FAITH: http://thebridegroomscafe.com/author.htm

object.content:

A sacrifice of praise is belief in God that we activate as a response of TRUST to a sudden, seemingly unfavorable life change.
